nodes.text: Pig-lizard Flu was a type of flu that was known to the galaxy by the time of the renewed war between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic. While contemplating the idea of creating his own virus in order to cure it and therefore become famous, the xenopathologist and combat medic Archiban Kimble—better known as Doc—considered combining Pig-lizard Flu with Gamorrean Mumps as a starting point. The flu was named after "pig-lizard," a derogatory term for a member of the porcine Gamorrean species.
Pig-lizard Flu was first mentioned in the BioWare–LucasArts video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, during the conversation "Opportunity Knocks" with the Jedi Knight class' companion character Doc.
